tasks.title: Organize the Bookshelf
tasks.desc: Sort all the books on your bookshelf by genre, author, or color. Make sure to arrange them neatly and consider adding bookends or decorative items for a polished look.

tasks.title: Prepare a Weekly Meal Plan
tasks.desc: Create a meal plan for the upcoming week. Include breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks. Make a shopping list based on the ingredients needed and consider any dietary preferences or restrictions.

tasks.title: Update Your Resume
tasks.desc: Revise your resume to include recent job experiences, skills, and accomplishments. Ensure that the formatting is clean and professional. Tailor it to align with the type of roles youâ€™re interested in.

tasks.title: Clean Out Your Email Inbox
tasks.desc: Go through your email inbox and delete or archive old, irrelevant messages. Organize important emails into folders and set up filters to manage incoming messages more efficiently.

tasks.title: Plant a Small Herb Garden
tasks.desc: Choose a variety of herbs you like, such as basil, mint, or rosemary. Plant them in small pots or a garden bed. Ensure they get enough sunlight and water, and keep an eye on their growth.
